title: Internet != Smarter People
excerpt: I was certain the Internet would make people smarter and more informed via better access to information. Instead, in many ways the opposite happened.

body.raw: I was certain the Internet would make people smarter and more informed via better access to information. Instead, in many ways the opposite happened. > "Social media gives legions of idiots the right to speak when they once only spoke at a bar after a glass of wine, without harming the community [...] but now they have the same right to speak as a Nobel Prize winner. It's the invasion of the idiots." [[1]](#1) > > — Umberto Eco [1] [Studies on Media Culture](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umberto_Eco#Studies_on_media_culture)
